verbose_text: CD4 T cells are necessary to drive PRRSV specific proliferative responses in vitro [XREF_BIBR], CD8 T cells are the predominant population expanded by PRRSV stimulation in vitro [XREF_BIBR] and both CD4 and CD8 T cells contribute to PRRSV specific IFN-gamma responses [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CD4 and CD8 T cells contribute to PRRSV-specific IFN-gamma
